About.subtitle: NIMA Studio is a distributed collective of senior engineers and designers, led by Nima Afsharfar. We don't just write code; we build businesses.

founder.p1: With over 12 years of experience in software development, I've seen the real challenges of the engineering world.
founder.p2: My goal in founding Nima Studio was simple: to bring Silicon Valley quality engineering to startups and businesses worldwide.
founder.p3: We stand against traditional, low-quality outsourcing models. Here, you work with senior architects who deeply understand your business concerns.
founder.p4: While our vision is global, we are committed to bridging the gap between local potential and international standards, ensuring that world-class technology is accessible to visionaries everywhere.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to NIMA Studio. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

data.title: 2. Data We Collect
data.content: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together follows:

items.identity: Identity Data includes first name, last name, username or similar identifier.
items.contact: Contact Data includes email address and telephone number.
items.technical: Technical Data includes internet protocol (IP) address, browser type and version, time zone setting and location.

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
usage.content: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:

items.contract: Where we need to perform the contract we are about to enter into or have entered into with you.
items.legitimate: Where it is necessary for our legitimate interests (or those of a third party) and your interests and fundamental rights do not override those interests.

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
